description:
Team Masho’s leader looks impossible to beat, but as Yukina tries desperately to enter the stadium, Kuwabara will have to find the strength to save his team. He’s Team Urameshi’s only hope!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Matter of Love and Death
Kesshi no Kuwabara! Ai no Totsugeki
決死の桑原! 愛の突撃
